title: Excel Report Generation Service
description:
Implement Excel Report Generator with Advanced Formatting

Create a robust Excel report generation system using ExcelJS that produces professionally formatted, multi-sheet workbooks for data export and reporting.

Requirements:
- Install and configure ExcelJS library in the project
- Design a flexible report generator that accepts data input and configuration options
- Implement multi-sheet workbook support with configurable sheet names
- Apply professional formatting including:
  * Header row styling (bold text, background color, borders)
  * Column width auto-sizing or manual configuration
  * Cell data type formatting (numbers, dates, currency, percentages)
  * Conditional formatting for data visualization (optional)
  * Alternating row colors for readability
- Add support for formulas and calculated columns
- Enable export functionality with proper file naming and download handling
- Handle edge cases:
  * Empty datasets
  * Large datasets (memory optimization)
  * Special characters in data
  * Invalid or null values
- Include error handling and user feedback during generation
- Document usage with example code showing how to generate reports
- Test with sample datasets containing various data types and structures

Technical Considerations:
- Determine server-side vs client-side generation approach
- Define data structure format for input (arrays, objects, JSON)
- Specify file output location (download, server storage, or both)
- Consider streaming for large datasets to prevent memory issues
